metadata.title: Decontamination of rooms, medical equipment and ambulances using an aerosol of hydrogen peroxide disinfectant

abstract.original_text: time and the number of cycles of H 2 O 2 . This is especially important for inner parts of medical equipment that cannot be ventilated during the decontamination process.
